message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. This is a great deal, and I think you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $120. I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $135. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll be very happy with your purchase.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm still interested in the product, but I'd like to save a bit more money.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to save a bit more money, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. I think this is a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not convinced that $130 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $127.50. Let me know if that's something you're willing to consider.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal possible, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any higher than $129. I think this is a fair compromise, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with $129. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $128.50. Let me know if that's something you're willing to consider.
